trans-unit.source: With the members of the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> namespace, you can programmatically create grammars that comply with the W3C <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0</see> (SRGS).
trans-unit.target: Con los miembros del espacio de nombres <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" />, puede crear mediante programación gramáticas conforme a la <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Especificación de la gramática de reconocimiento de voz versión 1.0</see> (SRGS) de W3C.

trans-unit.source: To create an SRGS grammar programmatically, you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements.
trans-unit.target: Para crear mediante programación una gramática SRGS, construir vacío <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instancia y agregue instancias de clases que representan elementos SRGS.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> classes represent elements defined in the SRGS specification.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> clases que representan los elementos definidos en la especificación de SRGS.

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class represent attributes in the SRGS specification, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Algunas de las propiedades de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> clase representan los atributos de la especificación de SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [SRGS Grammar XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) for a reference to the elements and attributes of the SRGS specification as supported by System.Speech.
trans-unit.target: Vea [SRGS gramática XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) para una referencia a los elementos y atributos de la especificación de SRGS compatible con System.Speech.

trans-unit.source: To add a grammar rule to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Para agregar una regla de gramática para un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, use la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> método de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> clase.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the text within an SRGS element using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> instance.
trans-unit.target: Puede modificar el texto dentro de un elemento SRGS mediante la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> instancia.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> class, you can optimize recognition of phrases in a grammar by specifying subsets of a complete phrase that will be allowed to constitute a match, and by selecting a matching mode from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Con el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> (clase), puede optimizar el reconocimiento de frases en una gramática mediante la especificación de subconjuntos de una frase completa que se permitirá que haya una coincidencia y seleccionando un modo de búsqueda de coincidencias de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vea [crear gramáticas utilizando SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) en el [Guía de programación de la voz del sistema de .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obtener más información y ejemplos.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances from existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar files, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: También se puede construir <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instancias de los archivos de gramática XML compatible con SRGS existentes, de una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o de una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> class to prepare completed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objects for consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar los métodos de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> completado de la clase para preparar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objetos para su uso por un motor de reconocimiento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Grammars created with members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace can be used by constructors of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class to create <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gramáticas creadas con los miembros de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> espacio de nombres se puede utilizar los constructores de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> clase para crear <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos.
